---
title: "package.json"
---

## High-level description
This is a `package.json` file for the "pump" npm package. It defines the package's metadata, dependencies, and scripts. The package is designed to pipe streams together and close all of them if one of them closes.

## Symbols

### Package Metadata
#### Description
Defines essential information about the npm package.

| Field | Value | Description |
|:------|:------|:------------|
| name | "pump" | The name of the package |
| version | "3.0.0" | The current version of the package |
| repository | "git://github.com/mafintosh/pump.git" | The Git repository URL |
| license | "MIT" | The license type |
| description | "pipe streams together and close all of them if one of them closes" | Brief description of the package's functionality |
| author | "Mathias Buus Madsen &lt;mathiasbuus@gmail.com&gt;" | The package author's name and email |

### Browser Configuration
#### Description
Specifies browser-specific configuration.

| Field | Value | Description |
|:------|:------|:------------|
| browser | { "fs": false } | Indicates that the 'fs' module should not be used in browser environments |

### Keywords
#### Description
An array of keywords related to the package for improved discoverability.

Keywords: "streams", "pipe", "destroy", "callback"

### Dependencies
#### Description
Lists the package's runtime dependencies.

| Dependency | Version |
|:-----------|:--------|
| end-of-stream | ^1.1.0 |
| once | ^1.3.1 |

### Scripts
#### Description
Defines npm scripts for testing the package.

| Script | Command |
|:-------|:--------|
| test | "node test-browser.js && node test-node.js" |

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| end-of-stream | Likely used to detect when a stream has ended or closed |
| once | Probably used to ensure a function is only called once |

Note: The exact usage of these dependencies would need to be confirmed by examining the actual source code of the package.
